name: Escape (itch) (yujings)
description: Escape is an adventure explorative game in which players interact with the narrative as a robot, trying to escape from the expansion of the Sun after humans extinction. As the center star of the solar system, the Sun will slowly grow and eventually engulf the planets with the solar system. As the main character, Survivor will start its voyage from the Earth where it was made. And wandering around all eight planets in the solar system and finally find the way to escape. In this dangerous journey, Survivor will probably run out of fuel, trapped into the wormhole loops or head in the wrong directions. However, it will ultimately escape from the Solar System and reach the infinite Galaxy.
